Invoker’s Control

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, invoker
Benefit: When an enemy fails a saving throw against an effect caused by one of your divine attack powers, you gain a +2 power bonus to the next attack roll you make against that target before the end of your next turn.

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 140.
